executiveSummary: Entrepreneur Zach from Dallas, Texas, pitched his company PermaPlug on Shark Tank, seeking $350,000 for 15% equity. After strong sales performance and a compelling pitch, Lori Greiner offered $350,000 for 20% equity plus a $1 royalty until payback, which Zach accepted.
keyDecisions: Zach accepted Lori Greiner’s offer of $350,000 for 20% equity and a $1 royalty until repayment.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement and partnership terms with Lori Greiner
Scale up production and inventory management using new investment capital
Leverage Lori’s retail and distribution network to expand market reach

nextSteps: Zach will work with Lori Greiner to finalize the deal, increase production, and expand distribution, leveraging her expertise to bring PermaPlug to wider retail and commercial markets.
